ProductInfo.Features:
ZMODO KDF8-BARBZ8ZN-1TB 8CH H.264 DVR with 1TB HDD & 8 CMOS 480TVL 65ft IR Outdoor Security Cameras
DVR FEATURES: H.264 Hardware Compression, 1TB HDD Installed & Configured, Signal System: NTSC / PAL, Video Input / Output: BNC 8/BNC 1, Video Output: VGA, Audio Input / Output: RCA 4/BNC 1
Recording Mode: Continuous/ Scheduled/ Motion, Remote Access: LAN or IE Browser, Plug-n-Play, Supports Remote View via smart phone & 3G mobile with each of these systems: Android, iPhone & iPad® IOS, Symbian, Windows Mobile
Camera FEATURES: 1/4" Color CMOS Image Sensor, 480 TV Lines Horizontal, 3.6mm Lens, Signal: NTSC, Night Vision Min. Light: 0 Lux (IR On), IR Irradiation Distance: up to 65', Operation Temperature: -25°F~122°F, Weatherproof: Yes, Power: 12V DC, Mount: Wall, Video Connector: BNC, Power Connector: RCA 12V DC.
Package Includes: (1) ZMD-DD-SAN8-1TB (DVR-H9118V-1TB) 8 Channel DVR and 1TB Hard Drive Installed, (8) ZMD-CBR-BBS23NM (CM-C22623BG) Outdoor IR Security Cameras, (8) 60ft CCTV Power + Video Cables for Security Cameras, (2) 12V/1500mA Single Power Supply for Security Cameras, (2) 1-4 Splitter Cable for Security Cameras, (1) IR Remote Control, (1) User's Manual
ProductInfo.Name: ZMODO KDF8-BARBZ8ZN-1TB 8CH H.264 DVR with 1TB HDD & 8 CMOS 480TVL 65ft IR Outdoor Security Cameras
